title: Painful Emotions with Dr Alison Cook
description:
This is part 1 of our 3-part interview series with Dr. Alison Cook. Dr. Cook is a psychologist who has helped women, ministry leaders, couples, and families learn how to heal painful emotions, forge healthy relationships, and fully live out their God-given potential. Listen as she and Jennie talk about healing past trauma and how the different parts of you exist together.

HELPFUL LINKS:
